name: Alert
desc: Helps you see through disguises, lies, and hiding spots.

name: Clever
desc: Helps you solve mysteries, find clues, or remember old knowledge.

name: Friendly
desc: Helps you make friends with people so that they tell the truth and offer help.

name: Sneaky
desc: Helps you hide and move quietly without being seen.

name: Strong
desc: Helps you jump, climb, balance, and lift or move heavy things.

name: Tricky
desc: Helps you trick people with disguises, impressions, and made up stories.
